languages.text: Уставшая команда почти не держится на ногах и не слышит приказов. Самые выносливые офицеры бросаются вырезать двери. Когда двери отсека открываются, большую часть команды выволакивают едва держащиеся на ногах товарищи. Последн{mf|им|ей}, надсадно кашляя, с мостика выбегает Лорд-капитан.

traits.locale_text: Уставшая команда почти не держится на ногах и не слышит приказов. Самые выносливые офицеры бросаются вырезать двери. Когда двери отсека открываются, большую часть команды выволакивают едва держащиеся на ногах товарищи. Последн{mf|им|ей}, надсадно кашляя, с мостика выбегает Лорд-капитан.

languages.text: The crew is too tired, barely standing, to heed any orders. The most resilient officers rush to cut open the doors. When the way out opens, most of the crew are dragged out by their exhausted comrades. Last to leave the bridge, the Lord Captain runs out, coughing heavily.
languages.original_text: Уставшая команда почти не держится на ногах и не слышит приказов. Самые выносливые офицеры бросаются вырезать двери. Когда двери отсека открываются, большую часть команды выволакивают едва держащиеся на ногах товарищи. Последн{mf|им|ей}, надсадно кашляя, с мостика выбегает Лорд-капитан.

traits.locale_text: The crew is too tired, barely standing, to be responding to orders. The most resilient officers rush to cut open the doors. When the way out opens, most of the crew are dragged out by their exhausted comrades. The last one to leave the bridge, the Lord Captain runs out, coughing heavily.

The crew is too tired, barely standing, to be responding to orders. The most resilient officers rush to cut open the doors. When the way out opens, most of the crew are dragged out by their exhausted comrades. The last one to leave the bridge, the Lord Captain runs out, coughing heavily.

The crew is too tired, barely standing, to heed any orders. The most resilient officers rush to cut open the doors. When the way out opens, most of the crew are dragged out by their exhausted comrades. Last to leave the bridge, the Lord Captain runs out, coughing heavily.

The crew is too tired, barely standing, to heed any orders. The most resilient officers rush to cut open the doors. When the way out opens, most of the crew are dragged out by their exhausted comrades. Last to leave the bridge, the Lord Captain runs out, coughing heavily.

The crew is too tired, barely standing, to heed any orders. The most resilient officers rush to cut open the doors. When the way out opens, most of the crew are dragged out by their exhausted comrades. Last to leave the bridge, the Lord Captain runs out, coughing heavily.

languages.text: La tripulación está agotada y apenas puede mantenerse en pie; no digamos ya acatar órdenes. Los oficiales con más aguante corren a cortar las puertas. Cuando el camino se abre, muchos tripulantes tienen que ser arrastrados por sus exhaustos camaradas. {mf|El|La} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} es {mf|el|la} últim{mf|o|a} en salir, tosiendo con fuerza.
languages.original_text: The crew is too tired, barely standing, to heed any orders. The most resilient officers rush to cut open the doors. When the way out opens, most of the crew are dragged out by their exhausted comrades. Last to leave the bridge, the Lord Captain runs out, coughing heavily.

traits.locale_text: La tripulación está agotada y apenas puede mantenerse en pie; no digamos ya acatar órdenes. Los oficiales con más aguante corren a cortar las puertas. Cuando el camino se abre, muchos tripulantes tienen que ser arrastrados por sus exhaustos camaradas. {mf|El|La} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} es {mf|el|la} últim{mf|o|a} en salir, tosiendo con fuerza.

languages.text: 船员们太疲劳了，几乎站都站不起来，更别提执行命令了。最顽强的一部分军官冲过去，破坏了大门。当出路打开时，绝大部分船员都是被他们疲惫不堪的战友们拖出来的。最后一位离开舰桥的是领主舰长，跑出来之后便剧烈地咳嗽起来。
languages.original_text: The crew is too tired, barely standing, to heed any orders. The most resilient officers rush to cut open the doors. When the way out opens, most of the crew are dragged out by their exhausted comrades. Last to leave the bridge, the Lord Captain runs out, coughing heavily.

traits.locale_text: 船员们太疲劳了，几乎站都站不起来，更别提执行命令了。最顽强的一部分军官冲过去，破坏了大门。当出路打开时，绝大部分船员都是被他们疲惫不堪的战友们拖出来的。最后一位离开舰桥的是领主舰长，跑出来之后便剧烈地咳嗽起来。

languages.text: クルーは疲れ果てており、立っているのもやっとの状態で、どんな命令にも耳を貸さなかった。一番回復力の高い士官が急いで扉を開けようとする。出口が開くと、多くのクルーは疲れ果てた仲間達に引きずられていた。最後にブリッジを出るとき、ロード・キャプテンは激しく咳き込みつつ急いでそこを後にした。
languages.original_text: The crew is too tired, barely standing, to heed any orders. The most resilient officers rush to cut open the doors. When the way out opens, most of the crew are dragged out by their exhausted comrades. Last to leave the bridge, the Lord Captain runs out, coughing heavily.

traits.locale_text: クルーは疲れ果てており、立っているのもやっとの状態で、どんな命令にも耳を貸さなかった。一番回復力の高い士官が急いで扉を開けようとする。出口が開くと、多くのクルーは疲れ果てた仲間達に引きずられていた。最後にブリッジを出るとき、ロード・キャプテンは激しく咳き込みつつ急いでそこを後にした。

languages.text: Die Besatzung ist zu müde und kann kaum noch stehen, um Befehle zu befolgen. Die widerstandsfähigsten Offiziere eilen herbei, um die Türen aufzuschneiden. Als sich der Ausgang öffnet, wird der Großteil der Besatzung von ihren erschöpften Kameraden hinausgezerrt. Der letzte, der die Brücke verlässt, ist der Lord Captain, der hustend hinausläuft.
languages.original_text: The crew is too tired, barely standing, to heed any orders. The most resilient officers rush to cut open the doors. When the way out opens, most of the crew are dragged out by their exhausted comrades. Last to leave the bridge, the Lord Captain runs out, coughing heavily.

languages.text: L'équipage, qui tient à peine debout, est trop éreinté pour obéir aux ordres. Les officiers les plus robustes se précipitent vers les portes, découpeurs à plasma en main. Lorsqu'ils parviennent enfin à les ouvrir, ils doivent tirer la plupart des membres de l'équipage vers la sortie malgré leur épuisement. Une fois que tous les autres sont sortis, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} quitte le pont à son tour en toussant bruyamment.
languages.original_text: The crew is too tired, barely standing, to heed any orders. The most resilient officers rush to cut open the doors. When the way out opens, most of the crew are dragged out by their exhausted comrades. Last to leave the bridge, the Lord Captain runs out, coughing heavily.

traits.locale_text: L'équipage, qui tient à peine debout, est trop éreinté pour obéir aux ordres. Les officiers les plus robustes se précipitent vers les portes, découpeurs à plasma en main. Lorsqu'ils parviennent enfin à les ouvrir, ils doivent tirer la plupart des membres de l'équipage vers la sortie malgré leur épuisement. Une fois que tous les autres sont sortis, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} quitte le pont à son tour en toussant bruyamment.

languages.text: Mürettebat herhangi bir emre kulak veremeyecek kadar yorgun, zar zor ayakta duruyor. En metanetli subaylar, kapıları açmaya koşuyor. Çıkış yolu açıldığında mürettebatın çoğu, yorgun yoldaşları tarafından sürüklenerek çıkarılıyor. Köprüden son çıkan kişi olan Lord Kaptan, öksürerek dışarı koşuyor.
languages.original_text: The crew is too tired, barely standing, to heed any orders. The most resilient officers rush to cut open the doors. When the way out opens, most of the crew are dragged out by their exhausted comrades. Last to leave the bridge, the Lord Captain runs out, coughing heavily.

Çıkış yolu açıldığında mürettebatın çoğu, yorgun yoldaşları tarafından sürüklenerek çıkarılıyor. Köprüden son çıkan kişi olan Lord Kaptan, öksürerek dışarı koşuyor.
